text: Wide mouth 7.5% Retinal degeneration 5% Aortic regurgitation - Aortic valve stenosis - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Broad face - Corneal opacity - Depressed nasal bridge - Full cheeks - Genu valgum - Mandibular prognathia - Obstructive sleep apnea - Pes cavus - Short neck - Wide nose - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
